commander_insight_confirmation: Modules now have grades - red dot corner when debug/glitchy, yellow when usable, green when rock solid. Users know exactly what they're getting. Transparency builds trust. üî¥üü°üü¢
c1_mechanic_note: This grading system is BRILLIANT. It solves the chicken-and-egg problem: How do you ship experimental features without scaring users? Answer: Be honest about maturity level. Red = experimental (free), Yellow = beta (50% off), Green = stable (full price), Blue = enterprise (premium). Users self-select based on risk tolerance. Creators can ship early and iterate. Everyone wins.
